docker.name: RUN
docker.args: mkdir -p $BOOT_INSTALL && wget -q https://github.com/boot-clj/boot-bin/releases/download/latest/boot.sh && echo "Comparing installer checksum..." && sha256sum boot.sh && echo "0ccd697f2027e7e1cd3be3d62721057cbc841585740d0aaa9fbb485d7b1f17c3 *boot.sh" | sha256sum -c - && mv boot.sh $BOOT_INSTALL/boot && chmod 0755 $BOOT_INSTALL/boot
docker.raw: RUN mkdir -p $BOOT_INSTALL && wget -q https://github.com/boot-clj/boot-bin/releases/download/latest/boot.sh && echo "Comparing installer checksum..." && sha256sum boot.sh && echo "0ccd697f2027e7e1cd3be3d62721057cbc841585740d0aaa9fbb485d7b1f17c3 *boot.sh" | sha256sum -c - && mv boot.sh $BOOT_INSTALL/boot && chmod 0755 $BOOT_INSTALL/boot
